subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Both benches and bullpens emptied after Toronto reliever Aaron Sanchez was ejected for throwing at Alcides Escobar in the eighth inning of the Blue Jays’ win.
snippet: Both benches and bullpens emptied after Toronto reliever Aaron Sanchez was ejected for throwing at Alcides Escobar in the eighth inning of the Blue Jays’ win.
